title: The Eyes have it...or do they?
brief_description: Explores the major aspects of vision and the way in which it determines one’s conception of the world. Suggests that physically different eyes perceive reality differently. Shows the influence of physical and chemical stiumlation on the eye and discusses sensitivity to color, light, shadow, form and line.
